The Rockets were the superior shooters in this game , going 47 percent from the field , while the Warriors went just 39 percent from the floor . The Rockets were led by James Harden , who recorded 17 points ( 3 - 16 FG , 1 - 5 3Pt , 10 - 11 FT ) , three rebounds and four assists . Dwight Howard had a double - double of his own , finishing with 14 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 2 - 8 FT ) and 14 rebounds . It marked his second double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's averaged 17 points and 12 rebounds . Josh Smith also had a strong showing , finishing with 16 points ( 6 - 14 FG , 3 - 5 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) and eight rebounds . It marked his second double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's averaged 16 points and 12 rebounds . The only other player to reach double figures in points was Josh Smith , who came off the bench for 16 points ( 6 - 14 FG , 3 - 5 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) and eight rebounds . With Curry sitting out due to an ankle injury , Corey Brewer moved back into the starting lineup and posted a team - high of 13 points ( 5 - 15 FG , 0 - 4 3Pt , 3 - 6 FT ) , while also adding three steals . He 's had two solid showings in a row , combining for 39 points , 13 rebounds and seven assists . Stephen Curry finished with 40 points ( 12 - 19 FG , 7 - 9 3Pt , 9 - 10 FT ) , five rebounds and seven assists , while Klay Thompson had 17 points ( 6 - 16 FG , 2 - 8 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) and five assists . The Warriors ' next game will be on the road against the Dallas Mavericks on Friday , while the Warriors will travel to Cleveland to play the Cavaliers on Friday .

The Clippers were the superior shooters in this game , going 53 percent from the field and 30 percent from the three - point line , while the Wizards went just 39 percent from the floor and a meager 29 percent from deep . The Clippers also forced the Wizards into 21 turnovers , while committing only 11 of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Clippers were led by the duo of Chris Paul and Chris Paul . Paul finished with 23 points ( 9 - 20 FG , 1 - 5 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) , five rebounds and seven assists , while Jordan added 15 points ( 6 - 6 FG , 3 - 6 FT ) and 13 rebounds . It was the first time he 's surpassed the 20 - point mark this season , giving himself a new season - high in points . Coming off the bench , Wesley Johnson chipped in with 14 points ( 5 - 8 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) and four rebounds . The Clippers were led by the duo of Bradley Beal and Nene Hilario . Porter went 8 - for - 12 from the field and 3 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score 21 points , while also grabbing eight rebounds . It was his second double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 17 points and 12 rebounds . Marcin Gortat nearly matched Jordan with a double - double of his own , finishing with 12 points ( 5 - 13 FG , 2 - 2 FT ) and 16 rebounds . The Wizards ' next game will be on the road against the Boston Celtics on Friday , while the Wizards will be at home against the Portland Trail Blazers on Friday .

The Wizards ( 6 - 4 ) were able to hang around the Bulls ( 6 - 4 ) to a 4 - 4 lead in the first quarter , but the Wizards ( 6 - 4 ) battled back with a 26 - foot three - point deficit by the end of the first quarter . However , the Wizards ( 6 - 4 ) battled back with a 26 - foot three - point jumper with just over two minutes remaining in the fourth quarter . However , the Bulls ( 6 - 4 ) battled back with a 26 - foot three - point jumper by the end of the period that saw the Wizards ( 6 - 4 ) within two points with just over two minutes remaining in the fourth quarter . Markieff Morris then missed a second straight game - tying three - pointer with three seconds remaining , but Bradley Beal missed a 26 - foot three - point jumper at the buzzer to seal the win . Markieff Morris led the way for the Wizards with a 24 - point , 15 - rebound double - double that also included two assists , three blocks and a steal . Bradley Beal followed with a 24 - point , 15 - rebound double - double that also included two assists and three blocks . Marcin Gortat posted a 18 - point , 14 - rebound double - double that also included two assists and a steal . Tomas Satoransky provided 12 points , four rebounds and nine assists . Jimmy Butler paced the Bulls with 37 points , eight rebounds , nine assists , three steals and a block . Dwyane Wade was next with 14 points , two rebounds , two assists and a steal . Taj Gibson registered 13 points , five boards and an assist . Robin Lopez turned in a 10 - point , 13 - rebound double - double that also included an assist . Up next , the Wizards remain home to tangle with the Detroit Pistons on Friday night , while the Bulls head down to Central Florida for a showdown with the Orlando Magic on Friday evening as well .
